d.Name: SAP Document and Reporting Compliance: Electronic Invoicing for Italy
d.Description:
Before updating to this package make sure that you already have the following list of legal change notes implemented in your system: 2870461, 2959154, 2965231. For B2B unsigned document scenario please implement note 3034073. Please check also the latest changes in overview note 2684734.

This integration package provides content required to integrate SAP Cloud Integration (Neo environment) or SAP Integration Suite (Cloud Foundry environment) with SAP Document and Reporting Compliance and SDi in Italy. The integration is required to enable exchanging electronic documents with SDi and to support follow-up operations, such as sending or receiving invoices. The integration package is available for SAP ERP, SAP S/4HANA, and SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
d.ShortText: Set up integration packages to enable communication with external systems in Italy.
